WorkItem.Description:
UXMusingsRoughGreen.xaml and UXMusingsRoughRed.xaml both have the same bug.  Locate the style for the CheckBox.  Slightly down in the style, change this line:
 
<DoubleAnimation Duration="0" Storyboard.TargetName="DisabledVisual" Storyboard.TargetProperty="Opacity" To="" />
 
To:
 
<DoubleAnimation Duration="0" Storyboard.TargetName="DisabledVisual" Storyboard.TargetProperty="Opacity" To="1" />
 
You can also search for an empty double quote block to find it ("").
WorkItem.Summary: UXMuxingsRoughRed and UXMusingsRoughGreen have a bug with CheckBox Style
